content: snug turn lozenge 8 9 repeat lozenge 7 repeat lozenge 7 one more time for large cable-stayed beanie ~ aunt zany ~ 2/20/2022 ~ page 2 of 4 lozenge 10 ws skip tch slip_stitch in next 12 st chain 1 snug turn rs skip tch slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch in last spine st chain 1 snug turn note completed lozenge section is approximately 2-3/4 wide x 7-1/2 tall 8-1/2 tall for large body divider section row 1 ws slip_stitch blo in each st across chain 1 snug turn 30 36 row 2 rs yo-slip_stitch blo in each st across chain 1 snug turn row 3 ws i-slip_stitch blo in each st across chain 1 snug turn row 4 rs yo-slip_stitch flo in each st across chain 1 snug turn cable-stayed beanie ~ aunt zany ~ 2/20/2022 ~ page 3 of 4 body continuing repeat lozenge and divider sections 5 times leaving out foundation row final row 4 on last repeat of divider instead of usual row 4 work flat join insert hook front to back in blo of foundation st yo-slip_stitch flo in next row 3 st across do not fasten_off close crown by working decrease in every other row end starting each decrease in the stitch you just worked continuing in spiral fashion work invisible slip_stitch decreases insert hook in flo of each of next 2 sts yo and pull thru all loops around until about 6 8 stitches remain cut yarn sew hole closed with tail thru flo insert needed rs to ws weave in tail hatband edge trim round 1 join yarn on bottom edge of hat and work decrease starting each decrease in the stitch you just worked for 66 stitches evenly around round 2 turn so you are working on ws flat join by inserting hook from front to back under both loops of first st of round 1 chain 1 with yarn in front single_crochet blo with yarn in back ip-single_crochet flo around flat join after last round cut yarn and weave in end cable-stayed beanie ~ aunt zany ~ 2/20/2022 ~ page 4 of 4
